overview:
Steve has always had a passion for development. He created his first software as a service business at the age of 15 and went on to study Computer Science at Loughborough University, where he continued and completed a PhD. Specialising in highly scalable web apps, email and the field of information overload Steve has undertaken a wide range of programming challenges and has been involved in a number of software companies. More recently he has been focused on providing scalable web apps and is at home with all manor of programming languages and challenges.

Building on his skills as a developer and entrepreneurial nature he has started the journey towards being a fully fledged entrepreneur after recently being on of the founding members of the incoming email app CloudMailin.
